title: viLaiyaaDa idhu nErama kaNNa
sahitya:
viLaiyADa idu nEramA kaNNA alaimOdum tunbamadil uzhanriDum enniDam 



anupallavi



malaitanaik-kuDaiyAi Endiya mAdhavA alaikaDal kaDainda amarargal mudalvA 



caraNam



kALiyan mEl naTanam Adiya kaNNA tALinai paNindEn shrI rAjamannA

mALAda kAdalil manamurugi nondEn sArathi pOTriDum sarasija nayanA
